content.description: Person ATOP Mean Score 1 4.3 2 4.4 3 1.6 4 3.8 5 5.0 Five students ranging in age from 19 to 24 took part in a survey at a nearby college. The students were asked to rate their overall attitudes toward older people (ATOP), on a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 indicates a negative attitude and 5 indicates a favorable attitude. These results are presented in the table.
content.question: What is the range of the ATOP mean scores?

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
